pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Java' .jar Files for 'tabulizer' // 'Java' .jar files for the 'Tabula' http://tabula.technology/ 'Java' library, which are required by the 'tabulizer' R package. The version numbering of this package corresponds to versions of 'tabula-java' library releases https://github.com/tabulapdf/tabula-java/releases/.
